Sadio Mane vs Pep Guardiola: Tudingan Diving dan Main Seperti Biasanya
07 Nov 2019, 08:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane menganggap santai tudingan negatif Pep Guardiola tentang permainannya. Dia mengaku tidak pernah berniat diving, Mane hanya bermain seperti biasanya, mencoba membantu tim.
Akhir pekan lalu, Guardiola melontarkan komentar kontroversial di depan publik. Dia mengakui Mane sebagai talenta spesial, yang terkadang diving untuk membantu tim.
"Terkadang dia diving, terkadang dia punya talenta untuk mencetak gol luar biasa di menit terakhir," tutur Guardiola kepada BBC Sport.
Komentar Guardiola ini tampaknya sengaja dilontarkan untuk memperkeruh situasi. Dia mungkin ingin memengaruhi wasit Michael Oliver yang memimpin duel Liverpool vs Man City akhir pekan ini.
Bagaimana tanggapan Mane? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!

Sadio Mane vs Pep Guardiola: Allegations of Diving and Playing Like Usual
Nov 7 2019, 08:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane relaxed Pep Guardiola's negative accusations about his game. He claimed he never intended to dive, Mane just played as usual, trying to help the team.
Last weekend, Guardiola made a controversial comment in public. He recognized Mane as a special talent, who sometimes dived to help the team.
"Sometimes he dives, sometimes he has the talent to score incredible goals at the last minute," Guardiola told BBC Sport.
Guardiola's comments appear to have been deliberately made to worsen the situation. He might want to influence referee Michael Oliver who is leading the Liverpool vs Man City duel this weekend.
